tasks.title: Create repository skeleton
tasks.description: Set up gsd-browser-ts directory tree (src/, scripts/, tools/, docker/, docs/, tests/, config/) with placeholder README/TEMPLATE_GUIDE referencing GSD_BROWSER_BLUEPRINT.md.

tasks.title: Initialize TypeScript project metadata
tasks.description: Add package.json, tsconfig.json, eslint/prettier configs if needed, and baseline scripts.

sessions.notes: Added package.json, tsconfig, eslint config, prettier file.

tasks.title: Implement stub MCP server & CLI
tasks.description: Create src entry (config loader, logger, CLI using commander or oclif) and stub stdio server mirroring Python features.

sessions.notes: Added config loader, logging helper, stdio server, and commander CLI with serve/diagnose/smoke/mcp-config commands.

tasks.title: Configuration and MCP snippet helpers
tasks.description: Add config parsing (dotenv + zod), structured logging flags, and CLI command to print MCP config (JSON/TOML).

sessions.notes: Implemented zod config loader, logging flags, and CLI/utility functions for MCP config output.

tasks.title: Developer tooling scripts
tasks.description: Provide scripts/run-local.sh, diagnose.sh, smoke-test.sh, and check-mcp-config.sh adapted for node/ts-node execution.

sessions.notes: Added run-local, diagnose, smoke-test, and check-mcp-config scripts for the TS template.

tasks.title: npm/pnpm installer suite
tasks.description: Create tools/install.sh/upgrade.sh/uninstall.sh using npm/pnpm (or corepack) to install globally via npm link/pnpm dlx.

sessions.notes: Added npm-based install/upgrade/uninstall scripts with manifest tracking.

tasks.title: Docker packaging
tasks.description: Add Dockerfile, entrypoint, and compose config for Node-based server.

sessions.notes: Created Node Dockerfile, entrypoint, and compose example.

tasks.title: Tests and automation
tasks.description: Set up vitest/jest + smoke tests, plus Makefile or npm scripts for lint/test/smoke/docker.

sessions.notes: Added vitest smoke test, vitest config, and Makefile mapping to npm scripts.

tasks.title: Documentation
tasks.description: Fill README, TEMPLATE_GUIDE, SETUP, TROUBLESHOOTING, UPDATING docs for TS version.

sessions.notes: Populated README, Template Guide, and docs (SETUP/TROUBLESHOOTING/UPDATING).
